sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CartContext } from '../contexts/CartContext' export default function Pizza({ pizza }) { const { cart, setCart } = useContext(CartContext); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const [varient, setVarient] = useState('small') const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const agregarAllCarro = () => { const pizzaSelected = { name:pizza.name, quantity:pizza.quantity, varient:pizza.varient } setCart({ ...cart, total:(pizza.prices[0][varient] * quantity)+cart.total, items:[...cart.items, pizzaSelected]}) } return (

{pizza.name}

Variedades

Cantidad

Total:${pizza.prices[0][varient] * quantity}

{pizza.name}

{pizza.description}
) }
